spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnome is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Magic Missile (Expends a 1st-Level Spell Slot)
entries: The gnome creates three magical darts. Each dart hits a creature the gnome chooses within 120 feet of it and deals 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) force damage.

action.name: Ray of Frost
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the gnome's next turn.
